briefTitle: Male Breast Cancer Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital Experience 1995-2007
officialTitle: Male Breast Cancer Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital Experience 1995-2007
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Retrospective chart review to evaluate the male breast cancer patient population at Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital over a period of years and compare the findings to historical data.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male breast cancer patients diagnosed and/or treated at Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital from the reference year of 1995 through 2007.
